stimulusHtml:
A country is currently in the second stage of the demographic transition. Currently the country has a birth rate of 37.9 births per 1,000 individuals and a death rate of 13.4 deaths per 1,000 individuals.

Which of the following changes would indicate that the country is moving from the second stage into the third stage of the demographic transition?
choicesHtml: The birth rate declines to 25.3 births per 1,000 individuals.
The birth rate declines to 13.1 births per 1,000 individuals.
The birth rate rises to 43.1 births per 1,000 individuals.
The death rate rises to 37.9 deaths per 1,000 individuals.
